WorkItem.Description:
I needed to make some slight tweaks to correct very nit-picky things.
 
1. In Default.aspx, add the following line after Line 27
 
27        FormsAuthentication.SignOut()
28        response.Redirect("Default.aspx")
 
This will reload the page after someone clicks Logout.
 
2. Make the following change to App_Code\TimePicker.vb
Change line 91 from
writer.AddAttribute("src", "images/dropdownbtn.gif")
 
To:
writer.AddAttribute("src", "../images/dropdownbtn.gif")
 
3. Make the same change to App_Code\DatePicker.vb on line 98.
 
Making the changes to those two files will allow the drop-down button image to show up.  I tried ~ instead of .. but that didn't work.
